Communications and documents
SDSU is committed to communicating often about the strategic planning process. We
                        invite all members of our campus community and extended global alumni network to visit
                        this site regularly, as it will be updated often.
                     
In addition to this website, we have several channels to keep students, faculty, staff,
                        alumni, and members of the general public informed. Those include NewsCenter, the university’s news site; campus emails to students, faculty and staff; and SDSU’s
                        Twitter account, @SDSU.
                     
If you have questions regarding the planning process, please email the SDSU Strategic
                        Planning Steering Committee via [email protected].
